content: pattern cast on 50 66 74 86 sts back shaping work neck ribbing ws k1 p1 6 10 12 15 times bind off 8 18 23 29 sts at beginning of next two row pm k1 p1 4 times k2 p1 k1 p2 k1 p1 k2 p1 k1 4 next row rs begin shaping back panel with decrease times pm p1 k1 to end of row continue knitting the row k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 stitches as they present themselves on subsequent row until the ribbing measures 1 1 1 5 1 5 inches ending repeat decrease row every right side row 12 17 22 on a wrong side row 26 more times put remaining 30 sts on scrap yarn or spare needle next row rs k 6 10 12 15 pm k 6 10 12 15 slip marker and begin row 1 of the diamond panel across 26 stitches slip marker k 6 10 12 15 pm and knit to the end of the row finishing next row ws and all subsequent wrong side row bottom edging knit stitches as presented with rs facing beginning at left side of sweater s shoulder shaping bottom pick up and knit 8 18 23 29 sts across bound off edge 24 30 37 45 sts down side of back and pm next row rs in addition to working the cable panel on knit sts from 30 back panel sts as follows p1 k1 5 all right side row begin increasing 1 stitch before the times p2 k1 p1 k2 p1 k1 p2 k1 p1 5x and pm pick last stitch before the first two markers and 1 stitch after up and knit 24 30 37 45 sts up side of back and 8 18 the first stitch after the last two markers the first 23 29 across bound off edge increase row will look like this do not join k 5 9 11 14 m1 k1 slip marker k 5 9 11 14 m1 k1 slip marker knit row 3 of diamond next row ws k1 p1 to marker knit sts as presented pattern slip marker k1 m1 knit to next to next marker slip marker p1 k1 to end of row marker slip marker k1 m1 knit to end of row 4 new sts made knit sts as presented on subsequent row until ribbing measures 1 1 1 5 1 5 inches and bind off all sts repeat the increase row 5 8 11 13 more times for a total of 74 102 122 142 stitches with dpns and right side facing pick up and knit 30 36 45 54 around leg opening spreading sts evenly among knit one ws row discarding first and last markers the needles place marker and join for working in the round work in k1 p1 rib for 1 1 1 5 1 5 inches and front leg openings bind off all sts rs k 8 10 12 15 sts break yarn
